action.action-desc: Mr. Rangel introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent qualified school construction bonds and qualified zone academy bonds, to treat qualified zone academy bonds as specified tax credit bonds, and to modify the private business contribution requirement for qualified zone academy bonds.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Rebuilding America’s Schools Act .

subsection.text: Subsection (c) of section 54F of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows:

subsection.header: National limitation on amount of bonds designated
subsection.text: There is a national qualified school construction bond limitation for each calendar year after 2013 in the amount of $11,000,000,000.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to obligations issued after December 31, 2013.

section.header: Modifications relating to qualified zone academy bonds

subsection.text: Paragraph (1) of section 54E(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: There is a national zone academy bond limitation for each calendar year after 2013 in the amount of $1,400,000,000.

subsection.text: Paragraph (3) of section 54E(d) of such Code is amended by striking rehabilitating or repairing and inserting constructing, rehabilitating, or repairing.

subsection.header: Modification of private business contribution requirement
subsection.text: Subsection (b) of section 54E of such Code is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking if the eligible local education agency and inserting
by striking the period at the end and inserting

the issue will be pooled with other such issues through the acquisition by, or the sponsorship or assistance of, a private, nonprofit corporation established in the District of Columbia and specifically recognized by Congress for the purpose of leveraging resources and stimulating private investment in education technology infrastructure.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to obligations issued after December 31, 2013.
